@ 41212, 50mb is your direct download speed, bit torrent is measured differently so you divide that by 8, your max torrent download would be 6.25mb. 

That said the reason you get low speeds is because so many people hit n run or slow there upload speeds to maximise there download speed n therefore slow it for everyone else. This is on a seedbox and will continue to upload.
